alert.note: Alert for Flathead, Mission Valleys (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Missoula (Western Montana and Central Idaho)
info.headline: Lake Wind Advisory issued August 17 at 1:35PM MDT until August 18 at 7:00PM MDT by NWS Missoula
info.description: ...HEAT ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL MIDNIGHT MDT TONIGHT... ...LAKE WIND ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT FROM 2 PM TO 7 PM MDT FRIDAY FLATHEAD LAKE... * WHAT...For the Heat Advisory, temperatures up to 100. For the Lake Wind Advisory Flathead Lake, southwest winds 20 to 25 mph with gusts up to 40 mph expected. * WHERE...Flathead/Mission Valleys. * WHEN...For the Heat Advisory, until Midnight MDT tonight. For the Lake Wind Advisory, from 2 PM to 7 PM MDT Friday. * IMPACTS...Strong winds and rough waves on area lakes will create hazardous conditions for small craft.
info.instruction: Winds this strong can make driving difficult, especially for high profile vehicles. Use extra caution.
